x10.matrix.block

Class BlockMatrix

  • x10.lang.Object
    • x10.matrix.Matrix
      • x10.matrix.block.BlockMatrix

  • public class BlockMatrix
extends Matrix
    Block matrix provides an abstraction of partitioned matrix in blocks, which could be either dense or sparse blocks.

    • Field Summary

        make
        

        public static BlockMatrix make(Grid gp)
        

        Declaration: make(gp:x10.matrix.block.Grid): x10.matrix.block.BlockMatrix{self.M==gp.M, self.N==gp.N}.
        Create an instance of block matrix.  Because the matrix block type is
unknow, there is no memory allocation.
        

        Parameters:
        gp - Grid partitioning of matrix

        Create block matrix with sparse blocks using specified partitioning
and nonxer density
        

        Parameters:
        gp - partitioning of matrix
        nzd - nonzero density or sparsity for all sparse blocks

        mult
        

        public Matrix mult(Matrix A,
          Matrix B,
          x10.lang.Boolean plus)
        

        Declaration: mult(A:x10.matrix.Matrix{self.M==this(:x10.matrix.block.BlockMatrix).M},B:x10.matrix.Matrix{self.M==A.N, self.N==this(:x10.matrix.block.BlockMatrix).N},plus:x10.lang.Boolean): x10.matrix.Matrix{self==this(:x10.matrix.block.BlockMatrix)}.
        Not implemented yet.

         This method is designed to perform block matrix multiplication,
returning this += A
* B if plus is true, else
this = A
* B

* B, when plus is true,
